channel.title: Homes on David Shih
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on David Shih

item.description: Biography I was a Process Analysis Engineer at Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC). I have solid experience in data analysis and software development for semiconductor process design and control. Now I’m currently a Software Engineer Intern at AYC Group LLC and focus on Web development as well as software design. Resume

item.title: Experience
item.description: AYC Group LLC Dallas, TX, United States Software Engineer InternMay 2018-Now Analyzed sales orders, purchase orders, revenue and customer behavior data to build a sales forecasting model by using Python and Scikit library, improving the accuracy rate of procurement by more than 93%. Integrated APIs of UPS, ChannelAdvisor, Bigcommerce and Fishbowl to migrate data from inventory systems to Marketplace applications, enhancing the efficiency of operator by 85% and reducing 90% human errors.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Implement a simple video processing application in LITMUSRTLink Technology: C | Linux | FFmpeg Applied LITMUSRT to evaluate the performance of real-time scheduling (PSN-EDF, P-FP, C-EDF and GSN-EDF). Implemented simple video as an input source, designed C program to link FFmpeg and LITMUSRT for decoding. Proved that average lateness and response time of PSN-EDF and P-FP were lower than others by 29.6% and 3.52%. Task Executor Library Technology: Java

item.title: Publication
item.description: The Study of Fabrication and Tribological Properties of Rubber Based Friction MaterialLink Advised by Prof. Chien-Ping Ju, Master Thesis, NCKU, Jul 2012 Investigated the effects of diverse fabrication parameters (heating rate of post-cured、molding pressure、temperature of post-cured and molding temperature) on tribological properties of Nitrile Butadiene Rubber (NBR)-based friction material. The mechanical properties, tribological properties, and microstructure of NBR based friction material are measured by Shore-type hardness tester, sliding wear tester, surface roughness tester and scanning electron microscopy.
